trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
Get-HotFix
Get-HotFix
SYNOPSIS
Gets the hotfixes that have been applied to the local and remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 获取已应用于本地和远程计算机的修补程序。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
Default (Default)
Description
DESCRIPTION

The Get-Hotfix cmdlet gets hotfixes (also called updates) that have been installed on either the local computer (or on specified remote computers) by Windows Update, Microsoft Update, or Windows Server Update Services; the cmdlet also gets hotfixes or updates that have been installed manually by users.
trans-unit.target: Get-Hotfix cmdlet 获取由 Windows 更新、Microsoft 更新或 Windows Server Update Services 安装在本地计算机（或指定的远程计算机）上的修补程序（也称为更新）；此 cmdlet 也获取由用户手动安装的修补程序或更新。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
This command gets all hotfixes on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将获取本地计算机上的所有修补程序。

trans-unit.source: This command gets all hotfixes on the Server01 and Server02 computers that have a description that begins with "Security".
trans-unit.target: 此命令将获取计算机 Server01 和 Server02 上其说明以“Security”开头的所有修补程序。

trans-unit.source: The commands in this example create a text file listing the names of computers that are missing a security update.
trans-unit.target: 此示例中的命令创建一个文本文件，其中列出缺少安全更新的计算机的名称。

trans-unit.source: The commands use the Get-Hotfix cmdlet to get the KB957095 security update on all of the computers whose names are listed in the Servers.txt file.
trans-unit.target: 这些命令使用 Get-Hotfix cmdlet 来获取其名称列在 Servers.txt 文件中的所有计算机上的 KB957095 安全更新。

trans-unit.source: If a computer does not have the update, the Add-Content cmdlet writes the computer name in the Missing-KB953631.txt file.
trans-unit.target: 如果计算机没有更新，则 Add-Content cmdlet 会将该计算机名称写入 Missing-KB953631.txt 文件。

trans-unit.source: This command gets the most recent hotfix on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将获取计算机上的最新修补程序。

trans-unit.source: It gets the hotfixes, sorts them by the value of the InstalledOn property, and then it uses array notation to select the last item in the array.
trans-unit.target: 它将获取修补程序，按 InstalledOn 属性值对其进行排序，然后使用数组表示法来选择数组中的最后一项。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
-ComputerName
Specifies a remote computer.
The default is the local computer.
Type the NetBIOS name, an Internet Protocol (IP) address, or a fully qualified domain name of a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 键入远程计算机的 NetBIOS 名称、Internet 协议 (IP) 地址或完全限定的域名。

trans-unit.source: This parameter does not rely on Windows PowerShell remoting.
trans-unit.target: 此参数不依赖于 Windows PowerShell 远程处理。

trans-unit.source: You can use the ComputerName parameter of Get-Hotfix even if your computer is not configured to run remote commands.
trans-unit.target: 即使你的计算机未配置为运行远程命令，你也可以使用 Get-Hotfix 的 ComputerName 参数。

trans-unit.source: -Credential
Specifies a user account that has permission to perform this action.
trans-unit.target: 指定有权执行此操作的用户帐户。

trans-unit.source: The default is the current user.
Type a user name, such as "User01" or "Domain01\User01", or enter a PSCredential object, such as one generated by the Get-Credential cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 键入用户名，如“User01”或“Domain01\User01”；或输入 PSCredential 对象，如 Get-Credential cmdlet 输入的一个 PSCredential 对象。

trans-unit.source: If you type a user name, you will be prompted for a password.
trans-unit.target: 如果键入用户名，则将提示你输入密码。

trans-unit.source: -Description
Gets only hotfixes with the specified descriptions.
trans-unit.target: 只获取具有指定说明的修补程序。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
The default is all hotfixes on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为计算机上的所有修补程序。

trans-unit.source: -Id
Gets only hotfixes with the specified hotfix IDs.
trans-unit.target: 只获取具有指定修补程序 ID 的修补程序。

trans-unit.source: The default is all hotfixes on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为计算机上的所有修补程序。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters

This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
None
You cannot pipe input to Get-HotFix.
trans-unit.target: 不能通过管道将输入传递给 Get-HotFix。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
System.Management.ManagementObject#root\CIMV2\Win32_QuickFixEngineering
Get-Hotfix returns objects that represent the hotfixes on the computer.
trans-unit.target: Get-Hotfix 返回表示计算机上的修补程序的对象。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
This cmdlet uses the Win32_QuickFixEngineering WMI class, which represents small system-wide updates of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 使用 Win32_QuickFixEngineering WMI 类，该类表示操作系统的系统范围小更新。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista, this class returns only the updates supplied by Microsoft Windows Installer (MSI), Windows Update, Microsoft Update, or Windows Server Update Services.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows Vista 开始，此类仅返回由 Microsoft Windows Installer (MSI)、Windows 更新、Microsoft 更新或 Windows Server Update Services 提供的更新。

trans-unit.source: It does not include updates that are supplied by Component Based Servicing (CBS), or other non-hotfix programs or apps.
trans-unit.target: 它不包括由基于组件的服务 (CBS) 或者其他非修补程序或应用提供的更新。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Win32_QuickFixEngineering class topic in the Microsoft .NET Framework SDK at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=145071.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 Microsoft .NET Framework SDK 中的 Win32_QuickFixEngineering 类主题，网址为 http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=145071。

trans-unit.source: The output of this cmdlet might be different on different operating systems.
trans-unit.target: 在不同操作系统上，此 cmdlet 的输出可能有所不同。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
Get-ComputerRestorePoint
